Description.Text: Location The hotel is located in the centre of the city, within walking distance of Plaza de las Armas, public buildings and Government House, San Cristobal Hill, the central market, Alhambra Museum and Santa Lucia Hill. Facilities The hotel was renovated in 2011. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. The hotel offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including gastronomic options such as a restaurant, a café and a bar. Guests can visit the supermarket to purchase daily necessities. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. A newspaper stand is also among the amenities at the hotel. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Additional services include a transfer service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Each accommodation unit features a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including a cooker. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool. The terrace is the perfect place to while away the time. The hot tub offers revitalisation. Active guests have various leisure options to choose from, including a gym, a spa and a sauna. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and B & B. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.

The hotel is located in the centre of the city, within walking distance of Plaza de las Armas, public buildings and Government House, San Cristobal Hill, the central market, Alhambra Museum and Santa Lucia Hill.

All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Each accommodation unit features a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including a cooker. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer.

The hotel was renovated in 2011. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. The hotel offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including gastronomic options such as a restaurant, a café and a bar. Guests can visit the supermarket to purchase daily necessities. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. A newspaper stand is also among the amenities at the hotel. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Additional services include a transfer service and a laundry.

The hotel offers an outdoor pool. The terrace is the perfect place to while away the time. The hot tub offers revitalisation. Active guests have various leisure options to choose from, including a gym, a spa and a sauna.
The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and B & B.

The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
*Chile's residents and citizens must pay additional tax at the hotel* *Swimming pool, Gym and Sauna are not available for refurbishment until further notice.*
